statements: SELECT * FROM policy_compliance_audit ORDER BY audit_id DESC;
SELECT policy_name, compliance_status FROM policy_compliance_audit WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT policy_name, regulatory_requirements FROM policy_compliance_audit WHERE regulatory_requirements LIKE '%PCI%';
SELECT * FROM policy_compliance_audit WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND audit_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, compliance_status, audit_timestamp FROM policy_compliance_audit ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT audit_id, policy_name, compliance_status, regulatory_requirements, audit_timestamp FROM policy_compliance_audit WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM policy_compliance_audit WHERE audit_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-08-01 23:59:59'
SELECT policy_name, count(*) as total_audits FROM policy_compliance_audit GROUP BY policy_name HAVING count(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_audits DESC
SELECT audit_id, policy_name, compliance_status FROM policy_compliance_audit WHERE regulatory_requirements LIKE '%GDPR%'
SELECT MAX(audit_timestamp) as latest_audit_timestamp, MIN(audit_timestamp) as earliest_audit_timestamp FROM policy_compliance_audit
SELECT * FROM compliance_policies;
SELECT policy_name, regulatory_requirement FROM compliance_policies WHERE regulatory_requirement = 'GDPR';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, regulatory_requirement FROM compliance_policies ORDER BY regulatory_requirement DESC;
SELECT audit_id, record_timestamp, audit_user, compliance_status FROM audit_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT policy_id, audit_user FROM audit_records WHERE record_timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days';
SELECT * FROM compliance_policies WHERE regulatory_requirement = 'SOX' ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT policy_name, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_policies GROUP BY policy_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT audit_id, compliance_status, policy_id FROM audit_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM compliance_policies WHERE regulatory_requirement = 'GDPR');
SELECT * FROM audit_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY record_timestamp ASC;

SELECT policy_name, regulatory_requirement, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_policies JOIN audit_records ON compliance_policies.policy_id = audit_records.policy_id GROUP BY policy_name, regulatory_requirement;
SELECT * FROM Policy_Compliance;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM Policy_Compliance WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT policy_name FROM Policy_Compliance;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM Policy_Compliance ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_description FROM Policy_Compliance WHERE policy_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM Policy_Compliance WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM Policy_Compliance WHERE policy_id > 10 ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_description FROM Regulatory_Requirements ORDER BY requirement_name ASC;
SELECT log_id, action_performed, timestamp FROM Audit_Logs WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_description FROM Policy_Compliance JOIN Regulatory_Requirements ON Policy_Compliance.policy_id = Regulatory_Requirements.requirement_id;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM compliance_records WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE category = 'Security';
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id = 2;
SELECT log_id, action_performed, user_id FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_name, description FROM compliance_records WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT requirement_name, category FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id < 100 ORDER BY requirement_id DESC;
SELECT policy_id, requirement_id, mapping_description FROM policy_mappings WHERE mapping_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM monitoring_policy_compliance;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM monitoring_policy_compliance ORDER BY policy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_category='Legal';
SELECT requirement_name, requirement_description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id > 3;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, audit_result FROM audit_records WHERE audit_result='Passed';
SELECT * FROM monitoring_policy_compliance ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM monitoring_policy_compliance WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01' AND record_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_category = 'Security' ORDER BY requirement_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employee_records WHERE employee_position = 'Manager' AND employee_department = 'IT Department';
SELECT audit_date, audit_description, audit_result FROM audit_records ORDER BY audit_date DESC LIMIT 10;
